casebody.data:
BARHAM
v.
HAWK, et al. No. 461PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. Scott M. Stevenson, Kathleen K. Lucchesi, S. Frederick Winiker, III, Patricia Wilson Magee, John D. Kocher, Charlotte, for Hawk & Ear, Nose & Throat. E. Hardy Lewis, Raleigh, for Gloria Barham.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of October 2005 by Plaintiff to Dismiss Appeal or in the Alternative to Deem Discretionary Review Improvidently Granted:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of March 2006."
